quote: Religion may become a fashion as well as anything else; and, when it does become so, it has as little to do, in those who thus hold it, with the heart and the character as any other fashion.
quote_letters: RELIGION MAY BECOME A FASHION AS WELL AS ANYTHING ELSE AND WHEN IT DOES BECOME SO IT HAS AS LITTLE TO DO IN THOSE WHO THUS HOLD IT WITH THE HEART AND THE CHARACTER AS ANY OTHER FASHION
